  * How can I use ffmpegthumbnailer in Nautilus?
Change the command value of the GConf key for each mimetype you want to assign to ffmpegthumbnailer. The keys are located in: `/desktop/gnome/thumbnailers/`

So to use ffmpegthumbnailer to create thumbnails for avi files change the command value of 
`/desktop/gnome/thumbnailers/video@x-avi` to:

{{{
/usr/bin/ffmpegthumbnailer -s %s -i %i -o %o -c png -f -t 10
}}}
